name: Solitaire Fortune
description:
Welcome to Solitaire Fortune - the hottest new real money solitaire game! Here you can not only play your favorite classic solitaire games, but also compete against other players for real cash prizes. Get the highest score you can, climb the leaderboards, and prove that you are the best!

All deposits and withdrawals are secure through PayPal, Apple Pay, Visa and Mastercard - pay an entry fee without worry and safely withdraw CASH to your PayPal or bank account.

This game is totally FREE to download. Download it today if you are a Solitaire, Spider, Klondike, Freecell, Pyramid, Patience or 21 enthusiast!

When you start a game, you will be matched against other players who are in the same skill level as you. Both of you get the exact same deck - whoever finishes with a higher score, WINS CASH! All the games are fair, and encrypted to prevent cheating.

Move higher up the league leaderboard, and play in higher difficulty games for BIGGER REWARDS! This game is addictive but in a good way - it sharpens your mind, is relaxing, and improves your solitaire skills and strategy. The aim is to be the best solitaire player, while having a lot of fun - and winning cash rewards!

Download and play today!
